Key Match Events: Oneil Cruz's defensive errors allowed the Royals to score runs in the fifth and seventh innings.
Mitch Keller pitched effectively, allowing only four runs over six innings despite defensive miscues.
Billy Cook struggled at the plate, going 0 for 10 with several strikeouts.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Derek Shelton acknowledged Cruz's defensive growing pains and highlighted the need for improvement.
Cruz expressed confidence in his center field performance and commitment to his offense.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates had an 11-4 historical record against the Royals at PNC Park.
